See @tbl-rdatasets


```{r}
#| label: tbl-rdatasets
#| tbl-cap: "Default datasets in R"

suppressMessages(library(DT))
suppressMessages(library(tidyverse))
dat <- data()
dat <- as_tibble(dat$results) %>% dplyr::select(-LibPath) %>%
  dplyr::filter(Package == "datasets")
DT::datatable(dat)
```
